title: Ein kalter Tag
translation: It is a bitter cold day. Anna stays at home and writes a letter. She uses a pencil and slowly spells the words. Through the window she sees the wide view over the big tree. On the balcony lie some flowers. Peter is naughty because he lost his bow. He needs the bow for his training. In the café, Anna orders a bread roll with butter and a beer. She listens to a CD and reads a book. The boss of the café is about 40 years old. Many buses drive past the café. Anna observes the wide streets and the cars. At the end of the day she is satisfied.
